title: How to Add a New Gift Card to Your Walmart Website Account

steps.title: Obtain the gift card from either a Walmart store or through the online website.
steps.content: Obtain the gift card from either a Walmart store or through the online website. Even the reloadable eGiftCard obtained from entering receipts from their Savings Catcher program are able to be loaded into their system for helping to pay for purchases on their website.

steps.title: Prepare the gift card for entry.
steps.content: Prepare the gift card for entry. Scratch off the card's silver scratch-off area with a coin or your fingernail. Scratching it off should reveal a 16 digit card number and a 4 digit PIN. You'll need both numbers to enter these cards into their system.

steps.title: Navigate to the Walmart website in your web browser and sign in with your Walmart online credentials.
steps.content: Navigate to the Walmart website in your web browser and sign in with your Walmart online credentials. Click the "My Account" button in the top right corner of the website, if you signed in recently and closed the box and came back to the Walmart website to get to the place you should be at.

steps.title: Click the "Gift Card/Bonus Offer Balances" link from about the center of the page.
steps.content: Click the "Gift Card/Bonus Offer Balances" link from about the center of the page.

steps.title: Click the Add a New Gift Card link from the area just above the label to the section that contains any other gift cards that might have been added to your account in the past that you might have forgotten were in there already.
steps.content: Click the Add a New Gift Card link from the area just above the label to the section that contains any other gift cards that might have been added to your account in the past that you might have forgotten were in there already.

steps.title: Enter the card number from the back of the new gift card into the Card Number field and enter the 4 digit pin into the PIN field.
steps.content: Enter the card number from the back of the new gift card into the Card Number field and enter the 4 digit pin into the PIN field.

steps.title: Verify if the card has been added correctly and has the balance you included at the register showing up in that page displaying all your gift cards.
steps.content: Verify if the card has been added correctly and has the balance you included at the register showing up in that page displaying all your gift cards.
